channel.title: Emote and GFX

item.title: Emote and GFX
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

So i made a command where you can do both an emote and a gfx at the same time. One thing though, it does the id for both the emote and gfx. I want it where you can make it like “::emotex (emote) (gfx)” So far I have: if (command.startsWith("emotex") && playerRights >= 2) { int emotex = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); if(emotex < 655) { stillgfx(emotex, absY, absX); if (emotex < 8000 && emotex > 0) { pEmote = emotex; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sM("Try again"); } } }

Read full topic
